# Support

## Getting Help

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support for OSSA:

### Documentation
- **Full Documentation**: [openstandardagents.org/docs](https://openstandardagents.org/docs)
- **Getting Started**: [openstandardagents.org/docs/getting-started](https://openstandardagents.org/docs/getting-started)
- **API Reference**: [openstandardagents.org/schema](https://openstandardagents.org/schema)
- **Examples**: [openstandardagents.org/examples](https://openstandardagents.org/examples)

### Community Support

#### Discord (Recommended for Quick Questions)
- **Join**: [discord.gg/ossa](https://discord.gg/ossa)
- **Best for**: Quick questions, community discussion, real-time help
- **Response Time**: Community members typically respond within hours

#### GitHub Discussions
- **Link**: [github.com/blueflyio/openstandardagents/discussions](https://github.com/blueflyio/openstandardagents/discussions)
- **Best for**: Longer-form questions, feature discussions, sharing examples
- **Response Time**: Maintainers respond within 1-2 business days

### Bug Reports

#### GitHub Issues
- **Link**: [github.com/blueflyio/openstandardagents/issues](https://github.com/blueflyio/openstandardagents/issues)
- **Use for**: Bug reports, feature requests
- **Before creating**: Search existing issues to avoid duplicates
- **Template**: Use the bug report template when creating an issue

### Security Issues

**DO NOT** open public issues for security vulnerabilities.

- **Email**: security@openstandardagents.org
- **See**: [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for details

### Email Support

For non-security inquiries:
- **Email**: team@bluefly.io
- **Response Time**: 2-3 business days
- **Use for**: Enterprise inquiries, partnership discussions, general questions

## What to Include When Asking for Help

To get the fastest help, please include:

1. **OSSA Version**: `ossa --version` or check `package.json`
2. **Environment**: OS, Node.js version, etc.
3. **What You're Trying to Do**: Clear description of your goal
4. **What Happened**: Error messages, unexpected behavior
5. **What You Expected**: Expected behavior
6. **Steps to Reproduce**: If it's a bug, how to reproduce it
7. **Code/Manifest**: Relevant OSSA manifest or code (sanitized of secrets)

## Response Times

| Channel | Typical Response Time |
|---------|----------------------|
| Discord | Hours (community) |
| GitHub Discussions | 1-2 business days |
| GitHub Issues | 2-3 business days |
| Email | 2-3 business days |
| Security Email | 24-48 hours |

## Community Guidelines

When seeking help:

- Be respectful and patient
- Search existing issues/discussions first
- Provide clear, detailed information
- Be open to feedback and suggestions
- Don't demand immediate responses
- Don't spam multiple channels with the same question
- Don't share sensitive information publicly

## Additional Resources

- **Twitter/X**: [@openstandardagi](https://twitter.com/openstandardagi)
- **Website**: [openstandardagents.org](https://openstandardagents.org)
- **npm Package**: [@bluefly/openstandardagents](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@bluefly/openstandardagents)

---

**Note**: Development happens on [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/blueflyio/openstandardagents). GitHub is a public mirror for community engagement.
